content.rendered:
FACIAL TREATMENTS

RELAXING FACIAL

This treatment includes deep cleansing, exfoliating, mild extractions, mask and a super relaxing oil massage. You will leave stress free!

$ 100
  • Treatment time: 60 mins
Book now

DEEP CLEANING FACIAL

A facial treatment that removes excess oil or blackheads and clarifies the skin. Combined with photodynamic light therapy, it rebalances your skin and controls excessive sebum production. Targets congested skin that is prone to acne or blackheads.

$ 120
  • Treatment time: 60 mins
Book now

MICRODERMABRASION

Microdermabrasion is a non-invasive procedure using a fine diamond tip that gently exfoliate the surface of the skin, removing the outermost layer of dead skin cells. The intensity will be adjusted to meet your skin’s specific needs, leaving you with an immediate glow.

$ 130
  • Treatment time: 75 mins
Book now

HYDRAFACIAL

This facial treatment is a revitalizing remedy for renewing and hydrating the look and feel of your skin. The specialized Hydrafacial method effectively removes dead skin cells and harmful debris on the surface of skin to reveal a healthy and new layer. The nourishing moisturizers and antioxidants incorporated in treatments maximizes the rejuvenating results with concealed hydration.

$ 225
  • Treatment time: 90 mins
Book now

DELUXE HYDRAFACIAL

The Deluxe HydraFacial treatment is an enhanced version of the HydraFacial. It includes tailored treatment super serums to address specific skin concerns. The HydraFacial treatment removes dead skin cells and extracts impurities while simultaneously bathing the new skin with cleansing, hydrating and moisturizing serums. The treatment is soothing, refreshing and immediately effective.

$ 225
  • Treatment time: 90 mins
Book now

PLATINUM HYDRAFACIAL

The Platinum HydraFacial is the ultimate HydraFacial. It starts with a detoxification process, called lymphatic drainage. The machine goes through a deep cleanse, exfoliation, extraction, and fusing the skin with beneficial serums for deep hydration. It also includes a booster best tailored for specific concerns such as signs of aging & hyper-pigmentation. It concludes with LED light therapy.

$ 300
  • Treatment time: 105 mins
Book now

CARBON LASER FACIAL

Carbon Laser Facial is a no-downtime procedure that helps rejuvenate the appearance of aging or damaged skin. This gentle procedure is safe on most skin types and is a great way to get a quick skin refresher without the longer downtime associated with other laser procedures. It evens skin tone by reducing appearance of pigment, fine lines and acne scars. Your skin will feel and look younger! Benefits can be seen in a single treatment, but best results are achieved after several treatments over a period of time.

$ 300
  • Treatment time: 105 mins
Book now

Who can benefit from this treatment?

For those who want to combat the signs of aging, Carbon Laser Facials can rejuvenate your skin by:

  • Reducing the signs of premature aging
  • Improving skin integrity and radiance
  • Reducing fine lines and wrinkles
  • Increasing skin tone and texture
  • Stimulating collagen growth for firmer, plumper skin
  • Reducing oily skin or exfoliating dry skin
  • Erasing or fading yellow/brown pigmentation
  • Shrinking scars (must be young scars of a small diameter).

 

What to expect during your treatment?

What to expect during your treatment Your technician may apply a light layer of Carbon Laser lotion to your skin, this lotion has a carbon base, so your skin will look as if you are wearing a mud mask. The treatment will begin by applying the laser energy to your skin. You will hear slight snapping sounds when the laser is activated and may feel a slight tingling or warmth. Multiple passes over your skin with the laser is done during each treatment.

How many treatments will I need?

Treating aging skin is an ongoing struggle. Carbon Laser Facial is such a gentle procedure that you can have one time or many. With no downtime, you can stop by for a Carbon Laser Facial before a special event and ensure you look your best. Your technician will recommend a treatment course that is right for you.

Is there any downtime?

With no downtime and minimal side effects, you may immediately return to your daily activities.

Does a Carbon Laser Peel hurt?

The majority of patients report no pain, they only experience a slight warming of their skin and a light prickling feeling. Typically, no anesthesia or topical is needed. There is no peeling after the treatment.

Benefits of a Carbon Laser Facial

There are many benefits to having a Carbon Laser Facial. You will notice:

  • Glowing youthful looking skin
  • Improved overall skin tone
  • Smoother feeling skin 
  • Reduction in appearance of fine lines and acne scars 
  • Gentle treatment can be performed over and over
BOOK NOW
